txt.en: You set the crate down atop the first one, and Dinodas contributes another as well
'Go see if there's a window we might use to get inside without being seen.'
A Caper On Honeymead Lane

'That entrance will work, but we'll need a stack of crates to block the view of it from all the nosey hobbits hereabout. I saw a stack of crates outside the Fox and Fiddle tavern, here in Nobottle. That should work!'

'That entrance will work, but we'll need a stack of crates to block the view of it from all the nosey hobbits hereabout. I saw a stack of crates outside the Fox and Fiddle tavern, here in Nobottle. That should work!'
Take a crate from the stack outside the Fox and Fiddle, in Nobottle
Take a crate from the stack outside the Fox and Fiddle, in Nobottle
Talk to Dinodas Boffin on Honeymead Lane and conduct his risky caper

'We'll need to sneak inside and steal back the gift before Angelica is able to open it. It's not \qstealing,\q [placeholder], not exactly! It isn't really her property until she opens it, is it? No, of course not. Anyone would say so! And it's only barely burglary. It's for the best, trust me!\n\n'Now go see if there's a window we might use to get inside without being seen.'
Take a crate from the stack outside the Fox and Fiddle, in Nobottle
Celebrate your successful caper?
'DNT - Blah!'
Talk to Camellia Boffin beside 8 Honeymead Lane

'That entrance will work, but we'll need a stack of crates to block the view of it from all the nosey hobbits hereabout. I saw a stack of crates outside the Fox and Fiddle tavern, here in Nobottle. That should work!'
'DNT - Blah!'
'DNT - Blah!'
'No time to waste, [placeholder]! Let's get that present back!'
Dinodas has come up with a plan to fix his mistake.

'Perfect, [placeholder], well-done! That could not have gone more smoothly! Now Angelica need never discover the tiny mistake I made concerning her house-warming present. Never has there been a more finely-executed caper!'
Dinodas Boffin is ready to begin the risky caper.
If you are to use this window, you will need to block the view of it with a stack of crates
Dinodas has his eye set on a side window through which you might be able to secretly gain access to 8 Honeymead Lane in order to steal back the gift.

'Dinodas! What are you whispering about? Why have you stolen back our house-warming present for Angelica? You were so proud of that painting of her new home!'

Camellia gasps, and her expression turns scandalous.

'You had that Elf paint the wrong house! And now you've embroiled me in your silly conspiracy too! Dinodas! How could you?'
Dinodas is beaming with pride and relief after the successful execution of the caper.
'Oh no!'
DNT - Blah!
Camellia Boffin has discovered you! How much does she know about the recently-concluded caper?
There are so many nosey hobbits around that you will need to stack crates outside the side entrance if you are to hide your caper from their view.
Success! This should block the view of nosey hobbits!
There are so many nosey hobbits around that you will need to stack crates outside the side entrance if you are to hide your caper from their view.
Camellia coughs meaningfully. You have been discovered!
Scout a side window to 8 Honeymead Lane
There are so many nosey hobbits around that you will need to stack crates outside the side entrance if you are to hide your caper from their view.
Carry the crate to the side window of 8 Honeymead Lane
Carry the crate to the side window of 8 Honeymead Lane
Carry the crate to the side window of 8 Honeymead Lane
You and Dinodas both set down a crate, but you will need some more
